hero.description: Create custom avatars, showcase products, and generate shopping videos. Embed real-time in stores and websites for seamless customer experiences.

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to create engaging AI shopping experiences

items.title: AI Avatar Generation
items.description: Create lifelike avatars with customizable appearance, voice, and personality traits

items.title: Virtual Try-On
items.description: Advanced AR technology for realistic product visualization and fitting

items.description: AI-powered content creation for engaging product presentations and sales pitches

items.description: Let the avatar showcase your app to create a video

items.title: Product Marketing

howItWorks.title: Real AI for Video Editing
howItWorks.subtitle: Professional video editing powered by advanced AI technology

steps.title: AI Script
steps.description: Using GPT-4x, our tool learns from 5 million videos to write perfect scripts. Advanced language models ensure engaging and natural content creation.

steps.title: AI-powered Clip Selection
steps.description: AI automatically understands, selects, and edits your video clips. Smart algorithms ensure perfect timing and seamless transitions.

steps.title: AI Voiceover
steps.description: OpenAI and ElevenLabs provide lifelike AI voices for professional, engaging video content. Multiple voice options and emotional tones available.

steps.title: AI Avatars
steps.description: Our AI tool provides diverse avatars designed specifically for marketing. Create engaging presentations with realistic virtual hosts.

steps.title: AI Auto-caption
steps.description: AI auto-generates diverse subtitle styles for viral short videos. Multiple caption styles and automatic language detection.

steps.title: 20+ Language Support
steps.description: Supports 20+ languages and AI voices for comprehensive video solutions. Global reach with localized content creation.

cta.subtitle: Join thousands of businesses using AI avatars to boost engagement and sales

footer.tagline: Transform your business with AI-powered shopping experiences that engage customers 24/7.
